model

Class FlightPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FlightPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FlightPath
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Model class FlightPath is used to keep track of the position of the plane. It calculates distance between start airport and destination airport, calculates how much of the distance has the plane already travelled. It calculates the time the plane needs to get to destination, heading it should go.
    See Also:

      • FlightPath

        public FlightPath(double[] start,
                  double[] destination)
        Constructor. Sets x and y of the start and destination and also calculates the distance between start and destination.
        Parameters:
        start - start airport
        destination - destination airport

      • FlightPath

        public FlightPath(double[] start,
                  double[] destination,
                  double averageSpeed)
        Constructor. Sets x and y of the start and destination and also calculates the distance between start and destination. Calculates heading, arrival time of the plane to the destination.
        Parameters:
        start - start airport
        destination - destination airport
        averageSpeed - average speed of the plane, final attribute
